sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Search, Bell, Calendar, MapPin, Clock, ArrowRight, Sun, Moon } from 'lucide-react'; const Dashboard = ({ user, events, theme, regCount, unreadCount, onReadNotifications, toggleTheme }) => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const isDark = theme === 'dark'; const styles = { // 1. CONTAINER: Use VW for width container: { padding: '2vw', // Responsive padding backgroundColor: isDark ? '#0f172a' : '#f8fafc', minHeight: '100vh', fontFamily: "'Inter', sans-serif", maxWidth: '95vw', // <--- CHANGED FROM 1400px margin: '0 auto' }, header: { display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center', marginBottom: '4vh', flexWrap: 'wrap', gap: '2vw' }, profileSection: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '1vw', cursor: 'pointer' }, avatar: { width: '4vw', height: '4vw', borderRadius: '50%', objectFit: 'cover', border: '2px solid #6366f1' }, welcomeText: { display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column' }, hello: { fontSize: '0.9vw', color: '#64748b', fontWeight: '500' }, name: { fontSize: '1.2vw', fontWeight: '800', color: isDark ? '#fff' : '#1e293b' }, rightHeader: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '1vw' }, searchContainer: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', backgroundColor: isDark ? '#1e293b' : '#ffffff', borderRadius: '50px', padding: '0.8vh 1.5vw', boxShadow: '0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.05)', width: '25vw', // Responsive width border: isDark ? '1px solid #334155' : '1px solid #e2e8f0' }, searchIcon: { color: '#94a3b8', marginRight: '0.5vw', width: '1.2vw' }, input: { border: 'none', outline: 'none', background: 'transparent', fontSize: '0.9vw', color: isDark ? '#fff' : '#334155', flex: 1, fontWeight: '500' }, iconBtn: { width: '3.5vw', height: '3.5vw', borderRadius: '50%', backgroundColor: isDark ? '#1e293b' : '#fff', border: isDark ? '1px solid #334155' : '1px solid #e2e8f0', color: isDark ? '#fff' : '#6366f1', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', cursor: 'pointer', position: 'relative', boxShadow: '0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.05)', transition: 'transform 0.2s' }, badge: { position: 'absolute', top: '0', right: '0', width: '0.8vw', height: '0.8vw', backgroundColor: '#ef4444', borderRadius: '50%', border: '2px solid #fff' }, // HERO BANNER: Height in VH heroBanner: { display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center', backgroundColor: isDark ? '#312e81' : '#e0e7ff', borderRadius: '1.5vw', padding: '3vw', marginBottom: '4vh', position: 'relative', overflow: 'hidden', boxShadow: '0 10px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.05)', height: '25vh' // <--- HEIGHT IN VH }, heroContent: { maxWidth: '40vw', zIndex: 2 }, heroTitle: { fontSize: '2.5vw', fontWeight: '800', marginBottom: '1vh', color: isDark ? '#fff' : '#1e1b4b', lineHeight: '1.2' }, heroText: { fontSize: '1.1vw', marginBottom: '2vh', color: isDark ? '#c7d2fe' : '#4338ca', lineHeight: '1.6' }, heroBtn: { backgroundColor: '#1e1b4b', color: '#fff', border: 'none', padding: '1vh 2vw', borderRadius: '0.8vw', fontWeight: 'bold', fontSize: '1vw', cursor: 'pointer', boxShadow: '0 4px 12px rgba(30, 27, 75, 0.3)' }, heroImage: { height: '22vh', objectFit: 'contain', display: window.innerWidth < 768 ? 'none' : 'block' }, statsRow: { display: 'flex', gap: '2vw', marginBottom: '4vh', flexWrap: 'wrap' }, statCard: { flex: 1, minWidth: '15vw', backgroundColor: isDark ? '#1e293b' : '#fff', padding: '2vw', borderRadius: '1.2vw', border: isDark ? '1px solid #334155' : '1px solid #e2e8f0', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '1.5vw', boxShadow: '0 4px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.02)' }, statIconBox: (bg, color) => ({ width: '4vw', height: '4vw', borderRadius: '1vw', backgroundColor: bg, color: color, display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center' }), sectionHeader: { display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center', marginBottom: '2vh' }, sectionTitle: { fontSize: '1.5vw', fontWeight: 'bold', color: isDark ? '#fff' : '#1e293b' }, seeAll: { fontSize: '1vw', color: '#4f46e5', cursor: 'pointer', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '0.3vw', fontWeight: '600' }, grid: { display: 'grid', gridTemplateColumns: 'repeat(auto-fill, minmax(20vw, 1fr))', gap: '2vw' }, eventCard: { backgroundColor: isDark ? '#1e293b' : '#fff', borderRadius: '1.2vw', overflow: 'hidden', border: isDark ? '1px solid #334155' : '1px solid #e2e8f0', transition: 'all 0.2s', cursor: 'pointer', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', boxShadow: '0 2px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.03)' }, cardImage: { width: '100%', height: '18vh', objectFit: 'cover' }, cardBody: { padding: '1.5vw', flex: 1, display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column' }, cardTitle: { fontSize: '1.2vw', fontWeight: 'bold', marginBottom: '1vh', color: isDark ? '#fff' : '#1e293b' }, cardMeta: { fontSize: '0.9vw', color: '#64748b', marginBottom: '0.5vh', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '0.5vw' } }; return (
navigate('/profile')}>
Welcome back, {user.name.split(' ')[0]}
{isDark ? : }
{ onReadNotifications(); navigate('/notifications'); }}> {unreadCount > 0 &&
}

Discover New Skills!

Join workshops, seminars, and events to boost your career.

{events.length}
Total Events
{regCount}
Registered
Upcoming Events
navigate('/events')}>View all
{events.slice(0, 3).map(event => (
navigate(`/event-details/${event.id}`)}>

{event.title}

{event.date.split('·')[0]}
{event.location}
{event.category}
))}
); }; export default Dashboard;
